description: The Department of ISC has a requirement for Business Consultant Services with expertise in developing and writing_
full_summary:
**TSPS 2.3 Business Consultant**
================================
**Job Title:** Business Consultants (Senior and Junior)
**Solicitation Number:** 1000258030
**Amendment Number:** 3 ( Issued: 2024-06-19)
# Job Description
The Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking two (2) Business Consultants for its Indian Oil and Gas Canada (IOGC) division. The job posting is open to only those who are experienced and hold a Supply Arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS with a Tier 1 Profile. We seek experts with the ability to develop business plans that contain strategic, operational, and functional elements.

**Essential Job Posts and Requirements:**

*   **Business Consultant Senior (Level 3):** Provide expert-level guidance and support on developing and writing complex business plans.
*   **Business Consultant Junior (Level 1):** Assist in developing business plans with assistance and oversight from Senior consultant.

**Requirement Length:**
_____The expected contract duration is 5 years and 4 months, commencing on October 1, 2024, and terminating on March 31, 2030.

**Eligibility & Work Location**

To be considered for this job, candidates must meet the following requirements:

*   Supply Arrangement holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 1 (= $0 - $3.75M)
*   Indigenous Services Canada requires that all chosen candidates be based in Calgary.

**Application Materials**

Request for Proposals can be accessed via the following URL: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38338/1000258030-npp_apm.pdf>

**Timelines**

*   **Publication Date (Last Amended):** 2024-06-19
*   **Closing Date and Time:** 2024-06-19 14:00:00
*   **Contract Start Date (Projected):** October 01, 2024
*   **Contract End Date (Projected):** March 31, 2030

**Points of Contact**

*   **Contact Information:** Elly Ha (ellyhyeonkyeong.ha@sac-isc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone Number:** (000) 000-0000
**Acknowledgements**

The TSPS 2.3 Business Consultant Request for Proposal (RFP) is strictly closed with
